name: Organic Salted Butter
des: Our organic salted butter is churned in our own Creamery on the farm, using cream from our organic pastured cows and a touch of sea salt. You can buys this product from Daylesford

name: Organic Waxed Cheddar 250g
des: A new addition for 2021, our award winning cheddar has been miniaturised and coated in wax. Waxed cheese have the benefit of retaining moisture. Perfectly sized and presented as a Christmas gift. You can buys this product from Daylesford
